summary: Fixed mesh for the Elven Quiver, eliminating the \"floating\" weird appearance of the model.
descriptionHtml:
Fixed mesh for the Elven Quiver, eliminating the \"floating\" weird appearance of the model.

How to install:

Unzip the file into your game folder (The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim), not you Data folder.

How to uninstall:

Delete the elvenarrow.nif file from your Data\\meshes\\weapons\\elven folder.


WARNING:

The purpose of this file is only to fix the problem with the Elven Armor, and since the default mesh looks fine with other armor models, this one may cause clipping issues in those cases.

Credits:

The team behind NifSkope for making such a great tool to fix the little weird things that happen in Nirn.

Bethesda Game Studios for the the best game of 2011.

Flobulon for the awesome Dark Elven Thalmor-style Equipment.
author: Van Schroding
